channel.title: CVE Feed for INFORMATION-TECHNOLOGY PROMOTION AGENCY, JAPAN (IPA) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for INFORMATION-TECHNOLOGY PROMOTION AGENCY, JAPAN (IPA) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2182|2024-08-05T13:48:04.310Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- hands-on%20vulnerability%20learning%20tool%20%22appgoat%22%20for%20web%20application
item.description: Hands-on Vulnerability Learning Tool "AppGoat" for Web Application V3.0.2 and earlier allow remote attackers to obtain local files via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-2179 and CVE-2017-2181.

item.title: CVE-2017-2181|2024-08-05T13:48:04.426Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- hands-on%20vulnerability%20learning%20tool%20%22appgoat%22%20for%20web%20application
item.description: Hands-on Vulnerability Learning Tool "AppGoat" for Web Application V3.0.2 and earlier allow remote attackers to obtain local files via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-2179 and CVE-2017-2182.

item.title: CVE-2017-2099|2024-08-05T13:39:32.282Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- hands-on%20vulnerability%20learning%20tool%20%22appgoat%22%20for%20web%20application
item.description: Hands-on Vulnerability Learning Tool "AppGoat" for Web Application V3.0.0 and earlier allows remote code execution via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2100|2024-08-05T13:39:32.337Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- hands-on%20vulnerability%20learning%20tool%20%22appgoat%22%20for%20web%20application
item.description: Hands-on Vulnerability Learning Tool "AppGoat" for Web Application V3.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to conduct DNS rebinding attacks via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2179|2024-08-05T13:48:03.685Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- hands-on%20vulnerability%20learning%20tool%20%22appgoat%22%20for%20web%20application
item.description: Hands-on Vulnerability Learning Tool "AppGoat" for Web Application V3.0.2 and earlier allows remote code execution via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-2181 and CVE-2017-2182.

item.title: CVE-2017-2101|2024-08-05T13:39:32.280Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- hands-on%20vulnerability%20learning%20tool%20%22appgoat%22%20for%20web%20application
item.description: Hands-on Vulnerability Learning Tool "AppGoat" for Web Application V3.0.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass authentication to perform arbitrary operations via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2173|2024-08-05T13:48:03.722Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- empirical%20project%20monitor%20-%20extended
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Empirical Project Monitor - eXtended all versions allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2128|2024-08-05T13:39:32.430Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- security%20guide%20for%20website%20operators
item.description: Security guide for website operators allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands via specially crafted saved data.

item.title: CVE-2017-2194|2024-08-05T13:48:03.713Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- source%20code%20security%20studying%20tool%20icodechecker
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Source code security studying tool iCodeChecker allows an attacker to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2102|2024-08-05T13:39:32.320Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- hands-on%20vulnerability%20learning%20tool%20%22appgoat%22%20for%20web%20application
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Hands-on Vulnerability Learning Tool "AppGoat" for Web Application V3.0.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2175|2024-08-05T13:48:05.158Z -- information-technology%20promotion%20agency%2C%20japan%20%28ipa%29 -- empirical%20project%20monitor%20-%20extended
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Empirical Project Monitor - eXtended all versions allows remote attackers to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of CASL II simulator (self-extract format) allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Empirical Project Monitor - eXtended all versions allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
